_comment: Per-agent credential access manifests. Three tiers: system (never exposed), agent (specific agents), shared (all agents).

system.description: Never exposed to any agent LLM context — gateway/runtime only

shared.description: Safe for all agents — non-sensitive operational config

main.description: Archer — orchestrator, needs Telegram for operator alerts

silas.description: SEO strategist — needs search APIs for audits

mozi.description: Business advisor — no service credentials needed

scribe.description: Content writer — no service credentials needed

scout.description: Research — needs search and YouTube APIs

builder.description: New site builds — needs WordPress access

wrench.description: Existing site fixes — needs WordPress access

specs.description: Technical SEO — needs WordPress + search console

citadel.description: Citation building — needs directory service APIs

ghost.description: PBN management — needs WordPress for PBN sites

ledger.description: Cost analysis — no external credentials needed

blitz.description: Paid ads — needs Google/Meta Ads APIs

forge.description: Overnight improvement engine — needs Telegram for morning reports
